casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Kevin Lamont LEAK. No. 664P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 6, 2005. Richard E. Jester, for Kevin Lamont Leak. Thomas J. Keith, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of December 2005 by Attorney General for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 6th day of December 2005."
